original_text: One day, after Moses had grown up, he went out to where his own people were and watched them at their hard labor. He saw an Egyptian beating a Hebrew, one of his own people.
korean_text: 모세가 장성한 후에 한번은 자기 형제들에게 나가서 그들이 고되게 노동하는 것을 보더니 어떤 애굽 사람이 한 히브리 사람 곧 자기 형제를 치는 것을 본지라

sentences.original_text: he went out to where his own people were
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 백성들이 있는 곳으로 나아갔다

sentences.original_text: and watched them at their hard labor
He saw an Egyptian beating a Hebrew
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 한 이집트인이 히브리인을 때리는 것을 보았다
